modName: Whistling Mine - No Snow Under the Roof
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center]For users of Whistling Mine by [color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Arthmoor[/b][/size][/color] and No Snow Under the Roof by [color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Prometheus[/b][/size][/color][/center][/size][center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1NoraKD.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=6]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73525/?]Whistling Mine[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51188/?]No Snow Under the Roof[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Load Order[/size][/color]
Place "Whistling Mine - No Snow Under the Roof.esp" AFTER "Whistling Mine.esp"


If you're a user of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor[/url] you might need this.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62120/?]Cutting Room Floor - No Snow Under the Roof[/url][/center]
author: SkyrimFantom

files.name: Whistling Mine - No Snow Under the Roof
